channel.title: Need help on two things
channel.description:
ok so i need help on
- admins cannot be attacked nor attack others in wild - if you drop anything it vanishes with the message, as soon it hit the ground it vanished, and you cant drop firecape, or empty.

item.title: Need help on two things
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“TOMSCAPE BETA, post:6, topic:273004”][quote author=Denoria link=topic=360337.msg2745600#msg2745600 date=1239612156]

Uhm more info please?

Like 317 or 508? etc.
[/quote]317 you idiot dont get ur postcount up

Next time post what deob it is then.

And for the ‘vanishes’ into the ground one you should put something together yourself and learn something for once.

If statement? Who knows? You certanly don’t.[/quote]

A deob is a client. Refer to it as a server version.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help on two things
item.dc:creator: @MasterofPK MasterofPK
item.description:
@MasterofPK wrote:

Ty noobspure.

Anyway, look for something like this in Client.java

if (playerRights == 2) { sM( "You drop the " + getItemName(droppedItem) + ", it vanishes into the ground."); deleteItem(droppedItem, slot, playerItemsN[slot]); return ; }
